#summary Examples for equals, hashCode and compareTo from JDK.

java.lang.Boolean (implementable using JAU: yes):
(similar implementations for java.lang.Byte, java.lang.Character
{{{
    private final boolean value;

    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
	if (obj instanceof Boolean) {
	    return value == ((Boolean)obj).booleanValue();
	} 
	return false;
    }
}}}

java.lang.Character.Subset (implementable using JAU:no):
{{{
    private String name;

    public final boolean equals(Object obj) {
        return (this == obj);
    }
}}}

java.lang.Double (implementable using JAU: no):
{{{
    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
	return (obj instanceof Double)
	       && (doubleToLongBits(((Double)obj).value) ==
		      doubleToLongBits(value));
    }
}}}
